mapper.insert: insert into student (name, no, gender, phone, id_card, is_college, address, degree, graduation_date, clazz_id, violation_count, violation_score, create_time, update_time) values (#{name}, #{no}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{idCard}, #{isCollege}, #{address}, #{degree}, #{graduationDate}, #{clazzId}, #{violationCount}, #{violationScore}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update student
name = #{name},
no = #{no},
gender = #{gender},
phone = #{phone},
id_card = #{idCard},
is_college = #{isCollege},
address = #{address},
degree = #{degree},
graduation_date = #{graduationDate},
clazz_id = #{clazzId},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select CASE WHEN degree=1 THEN '初中' WHEN degree=2 THEN '高中' WHEN degree=3 THEN '大专' WHEN degree=4 THEN '本科' WHEN degree=5 THEN '硕士' WHEN degree=6 THEN '博士' ELSE '其他' END as name ,count(*) as value from student group by degree
select clazz.name as name, count(*) as count from student right join clazz on student.clazz_id = clazz.id group by clazz.name order by count;
